amendment.description: Amendment provides up to $10 million of Immigration and Customs Enforcement funding for the Student and Exchange Visitor Information System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment which makes up to $10,000,000 available for the Student and Exchange Visitor Information System established under the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
